title: Heavy Duty Waterproof Propane Gas Grill Cover 55 to 67 Inches
features: While some gas grill covers are made of poor-quality materials that don’t hold up to the outdoors, the Two Elephants BBQ grill cover is made with heavy-duty 600D polyester. Designed to withstand the elements, our gas grill cover is weather-resistant, dustproof and UV resistant to keep your grill – and your grille cover – in top condition & ready for your next cookout!

When it comes to our outdoor grill cover, our waterproof barbecue grill cover is exceptionally resilient because we designed with all the elements in mind. Our amazingly hydrophobic material repels water and resists rips. Its sleek, black design will keep your patio or backyard looking stylish. And that UV protection? Great for helping keep your barbecue cover looking new. Prolong the life of your grill summer after summer.

The bound edges of our heavy duty grill cover offer full protection to keep your grill protected. Its 67" length x 24" depth x 48" height and secure-fit design make it a perfect grill cover 55 inch all the way up to 67 inches. The Two Elephants large grill cover is designed with compatibility in mind and fits most brands, while being easy to take on and off for fast access when you’re ready to fire it up!

Easy to clean, simply hose your grill covers heavy duty waterproof surface with water and the dirt will wash away, then let the sun do the drying! And when you hit grilling season and don’t want to keep your grill covered all the time, our waterproof grill cover folds up into a convenient storage bag that you can easily tuck away.

At Two Elephants, it’s our mission to create durable, high-quality BBQ covers waterproof heavy duty and UV resistant to keep your grill protected, so you can grill up epic food and great memories for years to come. If for any reason you don’t absolutely love your barbeque cover, reach out and we will make it right.
description: Unlike poor-quality BBQ covers that are quickly destroyed by the elements, the Two Elephants premium grill cover is made with heavy-duty 600D polyester. Weather-resistant, dustproof and UV resistant, our BBQ grills cover is designed to help your grill withstand whatever the great outdoors throws at it.

Impressively hydrophobic, our gas grill covers heavy duty waterproof design also resists rips, making those sharp grill corners an easy glide to cover. With a classic black design, our large BBQ cover will look style against your beautiful yard or patio decor.

The Two Elephants BBQ cover waterproof has bound edges for thorough protection. With a 67" length x 24" depth x 48" height, it offers a secure fit for a 55 inch grill cover up to 67 inches. Designed with compatibility in mind, our cover for grill waterproof fits most grills while remaining easy to put on and take off.

When it comes time to clean your 55 grill cover, simply hose it down and let it dry in the sun. And if you decide you want to show off your grill for a while, simply fold up your BBQ grill covers heavy duty waterproof and tuck it in the convenient storage bag. Our 4 burner grill cover is designed to help you prolong the life of your grill.
At Two Elephants, it’s our mission to create durable, high-quality BBQ grill covers that keep your grill protected, so you can make epic food and great memories for years to come.
